page.title: 05RIFFHAMS
page.content: We visited Riffhams.The owner of Riffhams is Mrs Handimarch,she is the fourth owner.Mrs Robert Spencer Philips was at Riffhams.We found out this imformation.Riffhams is 180 years old.It has thirty rooms and the grounds take up 45 acres.Riffhams used to be called "NEW LODGE." Eight people live at Riffhams including the staff of three.The house was specially built for John Robert Spencer Philips. He inherited the house when he was twelve years old.He moved into the house when he was twenty.Graham Roberts,a famous flying proffeser landed in the park in 1910.Riffhams has a kitchen garden.They grow fruit in the green house and vegetables outside.Approximately 23 acres of the Riffhams park is taken up by woodland.Repton a famous garden designer set out the Riffhams gardens.
